You need to upload your picture to some image hosting site (imgur,...) and then provide us with link to it because we can't see dircetly from your PC. And you posted in wrong section. We can't really help you until you properly post the image
Thanks I have adjusted the errors
It's still trying to link to your hard drive...
Question moved to support, pending clarification.
